subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The boards are going up, the ice is going down and everything is back on schedule for the N.H.L.’s outdoor game between the Buffalo Sabres and the Pittsburgh Penguins.
snippet: The boards are going up, the ice is going down and everything is back on schedule for the N.H.L.’s outdoor game between the Buffalo Sabres and the Pittsburgh Penguins.
